name: C2Call
overview:
Company Overview

FriendCaller, the only WebPhone of its kind, was developed by C2Call GmbH using C2Call’s cutting-edge browser-based VoIP technology. C2Call (Click-to-Call) developed a Java-based and cloud-hosted VoIP application that instantly turns any web browser into a phone. Using Java Virtual Machine (JVM), calls are made directly from any browser without the installation of proprietary software such as Adobe Flash, or other plug-ins.

C2Call’s JVM VoIP phone can be initiated instantly from a Website, Instant Message (IM) app, e-mail or hyperlink providing peer-to-peer VoIP calls. In addition to its unique capabilities, this application is compatible with Session Initiation Protocol (SIP), which is based on the same VoIP standard supported by Cisco, Avaya, Nokia, Vonage, and many other VoIP market leaders. C2Call’s core technology works with Windows, Mac, Linux, Android OS, and will also soon be available for Google’s Chrome OS.

It supports browser based echo cancellation, conferencing and just recently launched cross–platform, Multi–Party, Real Group Video Calling feature available for WebPhone, Android and iOS devices (iPhone, iPod touch and iPad). C2Call’s Java-based VoIP application provides the only platform-independent solution that can leapfrog today’s popular browser-based text chat, Voice and Video Calling.

Description

Enjoy the liberty to talk, take FriendCaller with you, wherever you go! Make Free Voice and Video Calls with your own US number and conduct Free Multi–Point Video Conference Calls from Android, iPhone, iPad, iPod touch and all Desktop Browsers without switching between the users! See them all LIVE! Anyone on the internet can join phone calls by simply clicking on a unique link, Call-Me Link, which can be shared on social networks like Facebook, twitter, Myspace, LinkedIn, etc. Hence, Calling made Easy!

Awards

Featured in Apple’s iTunes Rewind 2010.

FriendCaller is available for: iOS family (iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad) - Android Nokia S40 Facebook WebPhone FX SIP Devices Windows, Mac OS, Linux Blackberry (coming soon) http://fc.vc/fc-products
